posts.content:
I'm trying to resurrect a dead engine for my lad's bus so he can go on big road trip. Does anyone have a useable 90.5 piston and cylinder?
These are stock Mahle type A pistons used with stock crank - underside of the piston may be marked Mahle 90P34.
Cheers
Brian

Have found some pistons but now need a useable 90.5mm barrel to finish rebuilding the engine. Anyone have one skulking about on their shelves?
Cheers
Brian

hi, i have a set of pistons and barrels, used but not too worn, that i don't need. To be honest I reeally wanted to sell the lot, but I don't want a lot for them. If you are interested £50 would secure them. Also have heads for them too. I am pretty sure they are not Forged piston though, but were in a running engine and seemed ok' PM me if you are interested, cheers, Martin

dubletrouble wrote:hi, i have a set of pistons and barrels, used but not too worn, that i don't need. To be honest I reeally wanted to sell the lot, but I don't want a lot for them. If you are interested £50 would secure them. Also have heads for them too. I am pretty sure they are not Forged piston though, but were in a running engine and seemed ok' PM me if you are interested, cheers, Martin


Thanks for the offer Martin but I have now found all I need.
Brian
cool, good luck with the rebuild
